article_title: 5 Anti-Consumer Provisions That Didn't Make It Into the Omnibus Spending Bill
article_text: Politicians tried sneaking harmful measures into the budget bill, but a healthy dose of public outrage helped keep these items out

article_metadata.description: Lawmakers tried stuffing anti-consumer language in its spending bill, but consumer advocates fought back some of the worst provisions.
